name: Quick Cube
description:
In "Quick Cube", your only objective is to race to the finish. As you advance through levels, speed and difficulty increases. Master the controls and your timing to beat the game!

  • 5 colorful stages, each with its own unique music track.
  • Levels and obstacles are generated randomly.
  • Settings for difficulty, volume, and field-of-view.
  • Cheat keys for switching stages and levels.

You can play online for free: http://games.virtueone.com/uploads/game_quickcube/

Or, you can support me by purchasing!
